caption: Next to a chimpanzee, many insects were flying. A young chimpanzee climbed a tree, digging something from it and using its fingers and a stick to extract items from a tree hollow. The scene then transitioned to a jungle surrounded by mountains. Under the jungle's trees, there were many thorny plants. Here, you could find various butterflies and beautiful flowers. A snake crawled through the foliage and returned to its burrow. A group of baby snakes hatched from snake eggs. They emerged from the burrow, encountering numerous insects in their surroundings.
